overview:
Dean Cannell is a South Africa born Consumer Internet Entrepreneur & Angel Investor.

He has spent the last 10 years working in and with tech startups to learn the ins and outs of both development and marketing strategies necessary to successfully build and launch a startup on the internet.

He has seen and experienced many failures, 2 of which were his own - from this Dean has learned that failure is his best friend, advising him on how to take the next step differently to the last.
